useCase.name: P220: VC Revocation
useCase.description: Propose, Request ECDH, Request Create Token, Request Revoke VC, Confirm Revoke VC

mainSequence.step: Propose VC Revocation by the Certified App to TAS
Request ECDH key exchange between Certified App and TAS
Request creation of token for VC revocation
Request the actual revocation of VC using the token
Confirm the successful revocation of VC
